targets.query:
from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Environment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Dew Point [°C]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Environment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Environment_Temperature[*C]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Environment" or r["_measurement"] == "OptoBoard" or r["_measurement"] == "Pixel_SP_Chain")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Environment_Temperature[*C]" or r["_field"] == "OptoBoard_Temperature[*C]" or r["_field"] == "Module2_Temperature[*C]" or r["_field"] == "Module1_Temperature[*C]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Environment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Dew Point [°C]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "OptoBoard")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "OptoBoard_Voltage_Setting[V]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "OptoBoard")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "OptoBoard_Current_Setting[A]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Modules Cooling")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Cooling_Voltage_Setting[V]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Modules Cooling")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Cooling_Current_Setting[A]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Pixel_SP_Chain")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Serial_Modules_Voltage_Setting[V]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Pixel_SP_Chain")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Serial_Modules_Current_Setting[A]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "OptoBoard")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "OptoBoard_Status[On/Off]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Modules Cooling")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Cooling_Status[On/Off]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Pixel_SP_Chain")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Serial_Modules_Status[On/Off]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Pixel_SP_Chain" or r["_measurement"] == "OptoBoard" or r["_measurement"] == "Modules Cooling")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Cooling_Voltage[V]" or r["_field"] == "Module1_Voltage[V]" or r["_field"] == "Module2_Voltage[V]" or r["_field"] == "Opto Board Voltage [V]" or r["_field"] == "Serial_Modules_Voltage[V]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Pixel_SP_Chain" or r["_measurement"] == "OptoBoard" or r["_measurement"] == "Modules Cooling")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Cooling_Current[A]" or r["_field"] == "OptoBoard_Current[A]" or r["_field"] == "Serial_Modules_Current[A]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "LYSSY_OUT_S10")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "OUT_S10_C2")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "LYSSY_OUT_S10")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "OUT_S10_C1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "LYSSY_OUT_S10")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "OUT_S10_C3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "PixelSetup")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Environment" or r["_measurement"] == "Pixel_SP_Chain" or r["_measurement"] == "OptoBoard")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Environment_Temperature[*C]" or r["_field"] == "Module1_Temperature[*C]" or r["_field"] == "Module2_Temperature[*C]" or r["_field"] == "OptoBoard_Temperature[*C]")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
